医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肥胖或超重会降低精液质量吗？中国的研究人员发现，肥胖与男性精液质量下降之间存在显着关联，其中重度肥胖者的精液质量下降幅度最大。该研究强调了保持健康体重对男性生殖健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Does-being-obese-or-overweight-reduce-semen-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Does-being-obese-or-overweight-reduce-semen-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0da44e0-e772-4dac-a4d5-9920957ff058 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 00:09:00 -0400 Does being obese or overweight reduce semen quality?
利用大脑蛋白质增强糖尿病和减肥药物密歇根大学的最新研究表明，中枢神经系统中发现的蛋白质网络可以用来提高流行的糖尿病和减肥药物的有效性并减少副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Harnessing-brain- Proteins-for-enhanced-diabetes-and-weight-loss-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Harnessing-brain- Proteins-for-enhanced-diabetes-and-weight-loss-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74de0017-ae28-400f-b62f-198b2168d75b Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:51:46 -0400 Harnessing brain proteins for enhanced diabetes and weight-loss drugs
低GI地中海饮食可以提高糖尿病易感成年人的生活质量，但不能提高睡眠质量研究人员发现，低血糖指数地中海饮食可以改善与健康相关的生活质量的某些方面，但不能改善有 2 型糖尿病风险的成年人的睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Low-GI-Mediterranean-diet-boosts-quality-of-life-but-not-sleep-in-diabetes-prone-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Low-GI-Mediterranean-diet-boosts-quality-of-life-but-not-sleep-in-diabetes-prone-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=415fa592-732b-435a-baeb-c0e919462d10 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Low-GI Mediterranean diet boosts quality of life but not sleep in diabetes-prone adults
研究表明，免疫蛋白 C1q 会影响衰老大脑中的神经元蛋白质合成波士顿儿童医院贝丝·史蒂文斯博士的实验室进行的一项开创性研究表明，免疫蛋白会影响衰老大脑中神经元蛋白的合成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Immune- Protein-C1q-impacts-neuronal- Protein-synthesis-in-the-aging-brain-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Immune- Protein-C1q-impacts-neuronal- Protein-synthesis-in-the-aging-brain-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78e13d73-f3b4-4df9-9fd3-8a5b12189ec7 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:46:00 -0400 Immune protein C1q impacts neuronal protein synthesis in the aging brain, study reveals
“非常规”免疫反应的发现为结核病疫苗开发开辟了新途径根据一份新出版物，哈肯萨克子午线发现与创新中心 (CDI) 的科学家现已发现一种“非常规”免疫反应，这是开发结核病 (TB) 新疫苗的潜在新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Discovery-of-unconventional-immune-response-opens-new-avenue-in-TB-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Discovery-of-unconventional-immune-response-opens-new-avenue-in-TB-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a89c3bb-2260-4b34-afde-ffd6307bb397 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:29:59 -0400 Discovery of "unconventional" immune response opens new avenue in TB vaccine development
研究表明最佳镁水平可以降低痴呆风险研究人员发现了血清镁水平与痴呆症之间存在 U 形联系的适度证据，但需要更多的研究来阐明镁在认知健康中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Research-reveals-optimal-magnesium-levels-could-lower-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Research-reveals-optimal-magnesium-levels-could-lower-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95710bf3-1060-4308-80a8-582344b112ec Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:29:00 -0400 Research reveals optimal magnesium levels could lower dementia risk
杜兰大学在美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助下领导基于性别的精准医学研究如果一个男人和一个女人都患有心脏病，您可能会认为症状和诊断应该是相同的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Tulane-University-leads-effort-in-sex-based- precision-medicine-with-NIH-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Tulane-University-leads-effort-in-sex-based- precision-medicine-with-NIH-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a22795a0-3743-4d1d-a60e-df2ade120f37 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:25:13 -0400 Tulane University leads effort in sex-based precision medicine with NIH grant
研究人员发现 IRF1 在癌症进展和治疗反应中的关键功能加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员发现了一种名为干扰素调节因子 (IRF1) 的蛋白质在癌症进展和治疗反应中的作用的新细节，提供了可能有助于提高癌症免疫疗法有效性的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Researchers-discover-key-functions-of-IRF1-in-cancer-progression-and-treatment-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Researchers-discover-key-functions-of-IRF1-in-cancer-progression-and-treatment-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d54d0f5-8777-421c-8d54-1e074a79f783 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:08:48 -0400 Researchers discover key functions of IRF1 in cancer progression and treatment response
贫困地区的儿童面临更高的严重蛀牙风险，需要住院拔牙伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究人员发现，生活在贫困程度较高地区的儿童患严重蛀牙、需要去医院拔牙的可能性是生活在较富裕地区的儿童的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Children-in-deprived-areas-face-higher-risk-of-severe-tooth-decay-requiring-hospital-extraction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Children-in-deprived-areas-face-higher-risk-of-severe-tooth-decay-requiring-hospital-extraction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66f58d7c-42a5-42ce-aea1-2c1bb691bc4e Mon, 15 Jul 2024 23:03:41 -0400 Children in deprived areas face higher risk of severe tooth decay requiring hospital extraction
研究强调自残青少年的朋友的心理健康需求除了自残的年轻人所需的支持之外，自残或有自杀念头的年轻人的朋友可能还需要额外的支持，以防止对自己的心理健康产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Study-highlights-mental-health-needs-of-friends-of-self-harming-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Study-highlights-mental-health-needs-of-friends-of-self-harming-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19f14d73-ae6d-439d-8998-61b18ac44d3b Mon, 15 Jul 2024 22:58:31 -0400 Study highlights mental health needs of friends of self-harming youth
